detail_desc: Bikini top with lined cups, removable inserts and narrow shoulder straps that join and tie at the back.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.

Oversized jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, buttons at the front, a chest pocket and welt front pockets with a flap. Long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in soft cotton twill with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets, a low crotch and straight, wide legs.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Front pockets, elastication and inner ribbing at the cuffs, folded seams and reflective details. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Vest top in airy, ribbed jersey made from a soft silk and viscose blend with a low-cut neckline at the back.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Set with a hooded jacket and pair of trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Jacket with a zip down the front, chin guard, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and a jersey-lined hood with sewn-on ears at the top. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist and a zip fly and button.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a turtle neck, low dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Sleeveless romper suit in ribbed, patterned, organic cotton jersey. Wide shoulder straps with button fastenings, patch front pockets and wide fold-up ribbing at the hems. Lined at the top.
Blouse in an airy weave with an elasticated neckline and small frilled collar. Long raglan balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined, high-waisted bikini bottoms with a shaping effect to hold in and shape the waist.
Short dress in softly draping Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Short sleeves, open chest pockets and short slits in the sides.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups and ties at the neck and back.
Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and rounded, slightly longer back. One top has an all-over print.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.

Imitation suede biker jacket with notch lapels with decorative press-studs, a diagonal zip down the front and zipped side pockets. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs and a sewn-on, adjustable belt with a metal fastener at the hem. Lined.
Tube scarf in a soft knit. Width 60 cm, circumference 180 cm.
Thin metal Alice bands. One decorated with pearly plastic beads and one with a metal chain.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric made from cotton and recycled polyester. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Cylindrical sports bag in woven fabric with a zip and two handles at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap with a carabiner hook at each end. Zipped outer compartment on one short side, a zipped inner compartment and a small pocket. Lined.
Round-necked jersey T-shirt in a cotton blend.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waist panel.
Fitted, V-neck shirt in stretch poplin made from a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fully-fashioned trainers with mesh insoles and chunky, patterned soles.

Shirt in washed cotton denim with a turn-down collar, classic front with press-studs and a yoke at the front and back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable belt with metal D-rings at the waist. Unlined.
Top in airy linen jersey with a low neckline and narrow shoulder straps.
Hat in a soft chunky knit.

Denim shirt made from a Tencel® lyocell blend with a button-down collar, classic front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Sleeveless, circular dress in woven fabric with buttons at the back, a decorative bow at the front and gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping. Lined at the top.
Pleated blouse in an airy weave with frills. V-neck with ties at the neckline, concealed press-studs down the front, long sleeves with ties at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
Off-the-shoulder dress in airy jersey made from recycled polyester with elastication at the top and short, wide sleeves.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey made from a modal and organic cotton blend with a small flounce at the front that continues over the shoulders.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the top, short legs and press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in a textured cotton knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with appliqués, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Smartphone case in transparent plastic with pressed flowers. Fits iPhone 6-8.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short-sleeved blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, and a rounded hem.
Toe-post mules in imitation leather with square toes and covered block heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 5 cm.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, side pockets, detachable tie belt and tapered legs.
Fancy dress costume with a zip down the front, hood with appliqués and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a detachable, braided imitation suede belt and a flared skirt.

Wide tunic in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide, buttoned cuffs. Seam and flared peplum at the hem with a pleat at the front.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with a V-neck, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Shirt in washed denim with worn details, a collar, buttons down the front, chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Backpack in woven fabric with a handle and adjustable, padded shoulder straps. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment, two mesh side compartments and a padded back plate. Lined. Size 12.5x35x42 cm.
Trainers in scuba fabric and mesh with a rubber section that extends across the foot with lacing and around the back of the heel. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a fabric appliqué on the front, a press-stud on one shoulder, raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers in mesh with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short, wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.

Sports unitard in fast-drying functional fabric with wide shoulder straps, a seam under the bust and visible flatlock seams. The unitard has an integral sports bra with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and an elastic hem. The polyester content of the unitard’s outer fabric is recycled.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose viscose knit with an all-over print. No fasteners.
Short, fitted skirt in stretch jersey with a high, elasticated waist and zip down the front.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.

Calf-length, off-the-shoulder dress in a viscose crêpe weave with smocking and a frill trim at the top. Short puff sleeves with smocked trims, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Small football in printed imitation leather. Diameter approx. 14 cm.
Cycling shorts in patterned viscose jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Long-sleeved, knitted dress with a round neckline, buttons at the back of the neck and flounces down the front. Seam at the hips and a gently flared skirt.

V-neck blouse in a lightly crêped viscose weave with buttons down the front, a yoke and gentle gathers at the shoulders. Long sleeves with gathered cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, bell-shaped skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip and button at the back, and seam with a flare to the hem. Unlined.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a sleeveless top and pair of shorts in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Top with frills over the shoulders and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Shorts with elastication, a drawstring and a small frill trim at the waist, and frill-trimmed side pockets.
Smartphone case in transparent plastic with pressed flowers. Fits iPhone 6-8.
Hat in soft rib-knit cashmere.
Wide trousers in airy chiffon with elastication at the back of the waist, a tie belt at the front and wrapover legs with high slits at the front.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Round-necked T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.

Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener at the back. Side support and a silicone trim at the back.
